name: gp-practices-and-surgeries-data-quality-overview
title: GP Practices and Surgeries Data Quality Overview
description: An overview of the 22 columns available within the GP Practices & Surgeries Open dataset from the Department of Health / NHS Choices. This assessment (using Experian Pandora) looks at common data quality issues that may impact the utility of the data.

resources.name: GP Outlier Overview
resources.description: A more detailed assessment of the data quality issues present within the GP dataset that could impact users. For example, a focus on data entries that could be invalid such as poorly formatted web URLs, incorrect phone numbers and basic address errors. Can be reproduced using Experian Pandora Free Data Profiler.

resources.name: GP Column Stats
resources.description: An overview of the 22 columns from the Open dataset focusing on uniqueness, completeness, format types and other basic characteristics of the data. Can be reproduced using Experian Pandora Free Data Profiler.

resources.name: GP PAF Address Match Overview
resources.description: A brief column based view of the match quality of addresses to the Royal Mail PAF file. Note that this is indicative only.
